mil5.2.5:6.2: gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattakappe → gaṇanapathavītivattakappe (bj) | gaṇanāpathaṃ vītivatte na kappe (maku), tassa kusalassa balavegaṃ → taṃ kusalabalavegavipphāraṃ (bj) | taṃ akusalavegavipphārena (maku) | taṃ kusalaṃ balavegavihāraṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mil5.2.5:7.1: pure tava rājā daṇḍaṃ dhāressatī’ti → mā te rājā daṇḍaṃ pāpeyyāti (bj, maku)
